summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 21, 24 and 25, Wood's South Division of Green Lake Addition, being the alley between Keystone Place and Kirkwood Place from North 52nd Street to North 54th Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17273 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
